issue.title: Potential Solution for Peacock Ads
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [x] I checked the documentation and found no answer;
- [x] I checked to make sure that this issue has not already been filed;
- [x] This is not an ad/bug report.

### Problem description

Ads have recently started making their way through Peacock, and seem to have been for many users.

### Proposed solution

The following rules have successfully blocked all ads on Peacock:
```
||g*-vod-us-cmaf-prd-*.cdn.peacocktv.com  # blocks all ads
@@||g*-vod-us-cmaf-prd-mc.cdn.peacocktv.com  # seems to allow the main content to come through.
```

Would love some feedback on if this works for anyone else.

### Additional information

Thanks to [this list of domains](https://gist.github.com/ozankiratli/801ba17705e7f2a904d2e443af5a64f8#peacock) curated by @ozankiratli as the base of this solution.

issue.title: Peacock ads not blocked anymore.

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

labels.name: A: Waiting for data
labels.description: Waiting for more information from the user

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard DNS

### AdGuard version

0.107.55

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed ads or ad leftovers

### Which browser(s) do you use?

the problem is with app, not a site

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://channelstore.roku.com/details/2dd1a2670117700b87d7a40bfa7e6138/peacock-tv

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter

### Privacy

_No response_

### Social Widgets

_No response_

### Annoyances

_No response_

### Security

NoCoin Filter List

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

AdGuard DNS filter

### Language-specific

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. <comment>When using the Peacock app on our Roku it is no longer blocking ads. I don't have a screenshot or picture of it. But this behavior is across the board on all of my devices. I also have an Nvidia Shield and the Peacock app on my android phone. They all were blocking ads, and yesterday we noticed they are no longer blocking ads. 
2. I have updated all of my filters and the adguard version. This is currently running on a Raspberry Pi. No changes have been made to my network or devices. So not sure what would have caused the ads all of a sudden. 

3. Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

</details>

<details><summary>Screenshot N:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

</details>


### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
Peacock ads reappeared for me, and adding the following rule worked for me:

`||g006-vod-us-cmaf-prd-qw.cdn.peacocktv.com^`
